ygData.subject: Re: Skill cap?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thankyou I have had some time to look over this site and it is truly amazing.  Just what I need.  Thanks again. Odian ... From: Ric R  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Thankyou I have had some time to look over this site and it is truly
amazing. Just what I need. Thanks again.

Odian
-----Original Message-----
From: Ric R <redr@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 5:01 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Skill cap?


>From: Ric R <redr@...>
>
>Yes, I've seen Jewelcraft go over 200 on two players.
>
